general.name: allVisit_MADGICS
general.short: Summary file of scalar outputs from apMADGICS pipeline processing of all visit spectra in APOGEE DR17.
general.description: Summary file of scalar outputs from apMADGICS pipeline processing of all visit spectra in APOGEE DR17. Contains stellar radial velocities, DIB properties, and crossmatches to the standard DRP allStar and allVisit files.

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $APMADGICS/[VERS]/outdir_wu_[STAR_PRIOR_TYPE]/allVisit_MADGICS_[VERS]_[STAR_PRIOR_TYPE].fits where VERS = "v2024_03_16" for DR19 and STAR_PRIOR_TYPE has one of the values ["th", "dd"]

changelog.description: DR19 is the first release of apMADGICS

header.comment: file does conform to FITS standard
number of bits per data pixel

header.value: FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) format is defined in 'Astronomy

hdu1.description: Visit summary table of scalar outputs from apMADGICS.jl

header.comment: number of fields in each row

DIB_minchi2_final_1_15273.name: DIB_minchi2_final_1_15273
DIB_minchi2_final_1_15273.description: minimum value of the delta chi2 at the optimum for adding DIB model 1_15273 to the MADGICS model for the visit spectrum

tot_p5chi2_v1_1_15273.name: tot_p5chi2_v1_1_15273
tot_p5chi2_v1_1_15273.description: Total chi2 for the MADGICS model after including the DIB model 1_15273

DR17_LOGG.name: DR17_LOGG
DR17_LOGG.description: log(g) from ASPCAP allStar file for DR17

DIB_sigval_final_3_15672.name: DIB_sigval_final_3_15672
DIB_sigval_final_3_15672.description: DIB width sigma value at optimum for DIB model 3_15672

tot_p5chi2_v1_2_15273.name: tot_p5chi2_v1_2_15273
tot_p5chi2_v1_2_15273.description: Total chi2 for the MADGICS model after including the DIB model 2_15273

ingestBit.name: ingestBit
ingestBit.description: Bit mask value indicating any issues with ingesting the standard DRP spectra by the apMADGICS pipeline. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl for more

EW_dib_2_15273.name: EW_dib_2_15273
EW_dib_2_15273.description: Equivalent width of DIB in the 2_15273 DIB model

RV_pixoff_disc_final.name: RV_pixoff_disc_final
RV_pixoff_disc_final.description: Discrete (grid point) pixel offset nearest stellar radial velocity optimum

EW_dib_err_1_15273.name: EW_dib_err_1_15273
EW_dib_err_1_15273.description: Uncertainty in DIB equivalent width for DIB model 1_15273

a_relFlux.name: a_relFlux
a_relFlux.description: Relative fluxing applied upstream by DRP to chip a

DIB_minchi2_final_2_15273.name: DIB_minchi2_final_2_15273
DIB_minchi2_final_2_15273.description: minimum value of the delta chi2 at the optimum for adding DIB model 2_15273 to the MADGICS model for the visit spectrum

EW_dib.name: EW_dib
EW_dib.description: Equivalent width of DIB in 2_15273 DIB model

skyscale1.name: skyscale1
skyscale1.description: Second pass median sky flux in apMADGICS sky component model of the visit

DIB_sigval_disc_final_2_15273.name: DIB_sigval_disc_final_2_15273
DIB_sigval_disc_final_2_15273.description: Discrete DIB width sigma value (on gridpoint) at optimum for DIB model 2_15273

RV_verr.name: RV_verr
RV_verr.description: Stellar radial velocity error from apMADGICS, calibrated EXCEPT for systematics (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

data_pix_cnt.name: data_pix_cnt
data_pix_cnt.description: Number of unmasked pixels in the input spectrum to apMADGICS component separation

b_relFlux.name: b_relFlux
b_relFlux.description: Relative fluxing applied upstream by DRP to chip b

GAIAEDR3_SOURCE_ID.name: GAIAEDR3_SOURCE_ID
GAIAEDR3_SOURCE_ID.description: Gaia source ID from Gaia EDR3

DRP_VREL.name: DRP_VREL
DRP_VREL.description: Stellar radial velocity in the observed frame from standard DRP (km/s)

EW_dib_err_3_15672.name: EW_dib_err_3_15672
EW_dib_err_3_15672.description: Uncertainty in DIB equivalent width for DIB model 3_15672

dib_snr.name: dib_snr
dib_snr.description: Calibrated signal-to-noise ration for DIB detection under DIB model 2_15273

DRP_SNR.name: DRP_SNR
DRP_SNR.description: Visit signal-to-noise ratio estimate from standard DRP

DIBchi2_residuals_2_15273.name: DIBchi2_residuals_2_15273
DIBchi2_residuals_2_15273.description: Chi2 of the residual component after fitting DIB model 2_15273

EW_dib_3_15672.name: EW_dib_3_15672
EW_dib_3_15672.description: Equivalent width of DIB in the 3_15672 DIB model

DIB_v_LSR_COframe.name: DIB_v_LSR_COframe
DIB_v_LSR_COframe.description: Radial velocity of DIB in the local standard of rest used by Dame et al. 2001 for DIB model 2_15273

fluxerr2_nans.name: fluxerr2_nans
fluxerr2_nans.description: Number of nan pixels in the reinterpolated flux variance spectrum

RV_vel.name: RV_vel
RV_vel.description: Stellar radial velocity from apMADGICS in observed frame (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

DIB_sigval_disc_final_3_15672.name: DIB_sigval_disc_final_3_15672
DIB_sigval_disc_final_3_15672.description: Discrete DIB width sigma value (on gridpoint) at optimum for DIB model 3_15672

RV_pixoff_final.name: RV_pixoff_final
RV_pixoff_final.description: Pixel offset nearest stellar radial velocity optimum

RVchi2_residuals.name: RVchi2_residuals
RVchi2_residuals.description: Chi2 value for the residual component after the RV fitting step for the apMADGICS component separation

map2madgics.name: map2madgics
map2madgics.description: Index mapping the apMADGICS output files to the ordering of this file. CAUTION 1-indexed (not 0-indexed). Not identity mapping because we drop spectra that are entirely NaNs from this summary table.

DIB_pixoff_disc_final_3_15672.name: DIB_pixoff_disc_final_3_15672
DIB_pixoff_disc_final_3_15672.description: DIB discrete pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 3_15672

DIB_pixoff_final_3_15672.name: DIB_pixoff_final_3_15672
DIB_pixoff_final_3_15672.description: DIB pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 3_15672

DIBchi2_residuals_3_15672.name: DIBchi2_residuals_3_15672
DIBchi2_residuals_3_15672.description: Chi2 of the residual component after fitting DIB model 3_15672

DIB_pixoff_disc_final_4_15672.name: DIB_pixoff_disc_final_4_15672
DIB_pixoff_disc_final_4_15672.description: DIB discrete pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 4_15672

DIB_flag_1_15273.name: DIB_flag_1_15273
DIB_flag_1_15273.description: Flag describing the success/failure of gridsearch fiting DIB model 1_15273. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl/tree/main for explaination of bit values.

c_relFlux.name: c_relFlux
c_relFlux.description: Relative fluxing applied upstream by DRP to chip c

DR17_VSINI.name: DR17_VSINI
DR17_VSINI.description: VSINI from ASPCAP allStar file for DR17

DIB_pixoff_final_1_15273.name: DIB_pixoff_final_1_15273
DIB_pixoff_final_1_15273.description: DIB pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 1_15273

GAIAEDR3_R_MED_GEO.name: GAIAEDR3_R_MED_GEO
GAIAEDR3_R_MED_GEO.description: Gaia Bailer-Jones GEO distance estimate r_est from Gaia EDR3

DIB_sig.name: DIB_sig
DIB_sig.description: DIB width sigma for DIB model 2_15273

DRP_STARFLAG.name: DRP_STARFLAG
DRP_STARFLAG.description: Flag from standard DRP processing for star condition taken from bitwise OR of individual visits, see bitmask definitions

DIBchi2_residuals_1_15273.name: DIBchi2_residuals_1_15273
DIBchi2_residuals_1_15273.description: Chi2 of the residual component after fitting DIB model 1_15273

tot_p5chi2_v0.name: tot_p5chi2_v0
tot_p5chi2_v0.description: Total chi2 for the MADGICS model including only the sky continuum, (faint) sky lines, stellar continuum, stellar lines, and residual components

flux_nans.name: flux_nans
flux_nans.description: Number of nan pixels in the reinterpolated flux spectrum

DIB_sig_err.name: DIB_sig_err
DIB_sig_err.description: Calibrated uncertainty on DIB width sigma for DIB model 2_15273

starscale1.name: starscale1
starscale1.description: Second pass median star flux in apMADGICS star continuum component model of the visit

DIB_sigval_final_2_15273.name: DIB_sigval_final_2_15273
DIB_sigval_final_2_15273.description: DIB width sigma value at optimum for DIB model 2_15273

DRP_VRELERR.name: DRP_VRELERR
DRP_VRELERR.description: Uncertainty on the radial velocity from the stadard DRP

map2visit.name: map2visit
map2visit.description: Index mapping the standard DRP allVisit file to the ordering of this file. CAUTION 1-indexed (not 0-indexed)

EW_dib_1_15273.name: EW_dib_1_15273
EW_dib_1_15273.description: Equivalent width of DIB in the 1_15273 DIB model

RV_bary_offcor.name: RV_bary_offcor
RV_bary_offcor.description: Stellar radial velocity from apMADGICS in the frame of the solar system barycenter and also corrected for fiber-fiber RV variations (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

adjfiberindx.name: adjfiberindx
adjfiberindx.description: A unique fiber identifier running 1 to 600 to handle fibers at both APO and LCO

frame_counts.name: frame_counts
frame_counts.description: Number of contiguous exposures that were combined into a given visit

DIB_minchi2_final_3_15672.name: DIB_minchi2_final_3_15672
DIB_minchi2_final_3_15672.description: minimum value of the delta chi2 at the optimum for adding DIB model 3_15672 to the MADGICS model for the visit spectrum

RV_minchi2_final.name: RV_minchi2_final
RV_minchi2_final.description: Value of the minimum on the delta chi2 surface for the stellar radial velocity determinination step in apMADGICS

DIB_pixoff_final_4_15672.name: DIB_pixoff_final_4_15672
DIB_pixoff_final_4_15672.description: DIB pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 4_15672

DR17_X_H.name: DR17_X_H
DR17_X_H.description: X_H ("metallicity") from ASPCAP allStar file for DR17

tot_p5chi2_v1_3_15672.name: tot_p5chi2_v1_3_15672
tot_p5chi2_v1_3_15672.description: Total chi2 for the MADGICS model after including the DIB model 3_15672

tot_p5chi2_v1_4_15672.name: tot_p5chi2_v1_4_15672
tot_p5chi2_v1_4_15672.description: Total chi2 for the MADGICS model after including the DIB model 4_15672

DIB_minchi2_final_4_15672.name: DIB_minchi2_final_4_15672
DIB_minchi2_final_4_15672.description: minimum value of the delta chi2 at the optimum for adding DIB model 4_15672 to the MADGICS model for the visit spectrum

mskDIB.name: mskDIB
mskDIB.description: Boolean mask identifying stars that are well enough modeled that the DIB model 2_15273 outputs can be trusted. A DIB "detection" still requires a cut(s) on dib_snr and/or EW_dib.

DIB_v_LSR.name: DIB_v_LSR
DIB_v_LSR.description: DIB radial velocity in the local standard of rest for DIB model 2_15273

zcorr.name: zcorr
zcorr.description: Redshift correction to move from observed redshift to redshift relative to the solar system barycenter

RV_bary.name: RV_bary
RV_bary.description: Stellar radial velocity from apMADGICS in the frame of the solar system barycenter (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

EW_dib_err_4_15672.name: EW_dib_err_4_15672
EW_dib_err_4_15672.description: Uncertainty in DIB equivalent width for DIB model 4_15672

RV_flag.name: RV_flag
RV_flag.description: Grid search flag value from apMADGICS from the search for stellar radial velocity. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl for bit interpretations.

map2star.name: map2star
map2star.description: Index mapping the standard DRP allStar file to the ordering of this file. CAUTION 1-indexed (not 0-indexed)

DIB_verr.name: DIB_verr
DIB_verr.description: Calibrated uncertainty on DIB radial velocity from DIB model 2_15273

EW_dib_4_15672.name: EW_dib_4_15672
EW_dib_4_15672.description: Equivalent width of DIB in the 4_15672 DIB model

EW_dib_err.name: EW_dib_err
EW_dib_err.description: Calibrated uncertainty in DIB equivalent width for DIB model 2_15273

DIB_flag_4_15672.name: DIB_flag_4_15672
DIB_flag_4_15672.description: Flag describing the success/failure of gridsearch fiting DIB model 4_15672. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl/tree/main for explaination of bit values.

DIB_flag_3_15672.name: DIB_flag_3_15672
DIB_flag_3_15672.description: Flag describing the success/failure of gridsearch fiting DIB model 3_15672. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl/tree/main for explaination of bit values.

DIB_sigval_disc_final_4_15672.name: DIB_sigval_disc_final_4_15672
DIB_sigval_disc_final_4_15672.description: Discrete DIB width sigma value (on gridpoint) at optimum for DIB model 4_15672

DIB_pixoff_disc_final_2_15273.name: DIB_pixoff_disc_final_2_15273
DIB_pixoff_disc_final_2_15273.description: DIB discrete pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 2_15273

FIBERID.name: FIBERID
FIBERID.description: APOGEE FIBERID used to obtain the visit spectrum (1 to 300 at each of APO and LCO)

DIB_v_bary.name: DIB_v_bary
DIB_v_bary.description: DIB radial velocity with respect to the solar system barycenter for DIB model 15273

DIBchi2_residuals_4_15672.name: DIBchi2_residuals_4_15672
DIBchi2_residuals_4_15672.description: Chi2 of the residual component after fitting DIB model 4_15672

DIB_sigval_disc_final_1_15273.name: DIB_sigval_disc_final_1_15273
DIB_sigval_disc_final_1_15273.description: Discrete DIB width sigma value (on gridpoint) at optimum for DIB model 1_15273

starscale.name: starscale
starscale.description: First pass median star flux in apMADGICS star continuum component model of the visit

EW_dib_err_2_15273.name: EW_dib_err_2_15273
EW_dib_err_2_15273.description: Uncertainty in DIB equivalent width for DIB model 2_15273

skyscale0.name: skyscale0
skyscale0.description: First pass median sky flux in apMADGICS sky component model of the visit

RV_pix_var.name: RV_pix_var
RV_pix_var.description: Stellar radial velocity uncertainty expressed as a variance in the pixel offset (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

DIB_pixoff_final_2_15273.name: DIB_pixoff_final_2_15273
DIB_pixoff_final_2_15273.description: DIB pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 2_15273

DIB_sigval_final_1_15273.name: DIB_sigval_final_1_15273
DIB_sigval_final_1_15273.description: DIB width sigma value at optimum for DIB model 1_15273

TELESCOPE.name: TELESCOPE
TELESCOPE.description: Telescope used for the visit (either apo25m or lco25m for the 2.5 meters at APO or LCO)

MJD.name: MJD
MJD.description: Integer MJD (actually SJD, a SDSS construct) encoding the discretized "night" data was taken

chip_a_midtimes.name: chip_a_midtimes
chip_a_midtimes.description: Best approximation to midpoint in time for exposures used in the visit for chip a

chip_c_midtimes.name: chip_c_midtimes
chip_c_midtimes.description: Best approximation to midpoint in time for exposures used in the visit for chip c

DRP_VHELIO.name: DRP_VHELIO
DRP_VHELIO.description: Heliocentric (actually barycentric) stellar radial velocity from the standard DRP

GAIAEDR3_R_LO_GEO.name: GAIAEDR3_R_LO_GEO
GAIAEDR3_R_LO_GEO.description: Gaia Bailer-Jones 16th GEO percentile distance r_lo from GAIA EDR3

chip_b_midtimes.name: chip_b_midtimes
chip_b_midtimes.description: Best approximation to midpoint in time for exposures used in the visit for chip b

DIB_pixoff_disc_final_1_15273.name: DIB_pixoff_disc_final_1_15273
DIB_pixoff_disc_final_1_15273.description: DIB discrete pixel offset at optimum for DIB model 1_15273

DIB_v_rel.name: DIB_v_rel
DIB_v_rel.description: DIB radial velocity in observed frame (for model 2_15273)

GAIAEDR3_R_HI_GEO.name: GAIAEDR3_R_HI_GEO
GAIAEDR3_R_HI_GEO.description: Gaia Bailer-Jones 84th GEO percentile distance r_hi from GAIA EDR3

DIB_sigval_final_4_15672.name: DIB_sigval_final_4_15672
DIB_sigval_final_4_15672.description: DIB width sigma value at optimum for DIB model 4_15672

avg_flux_conservation.name: avg_flux_conservation
avg_flux_conservation.description: Median fractional flux conservation of MADGICS component separation across the visit spectrum

DIB_flag_2_15273.name: DIB_flag_2_15273
DIB_flag_2_15273.description: Flag describing the success/failure of gridsearch fiting DIB model 2_15273. See https://github.com/andrew-saydjari/apMADGICS.jl/tree/main for explaination of bit values.

RV_verr_sys.name: RV_verr_sys
RV_verr_sys.description: Stellar radial velocity error with systematic corrections for apMADGICS RVs (should be used with STAR_PRIOR_TYPE=th)

DR17_TEFF.name: DR17_TEFF
DR17_TEFF.description: TEFF from ASPCAP allStar file for DR17

final_pix_cnt.name: final_pix_cnt
final_pix_cnt.description: Final number of unmasked pixels used for modeling the visit spectrum

cartVisit.name: cartVisit
cartVisit.description: Cart identifier for plate cart used during the visit observation (variations in total throughput can depend on the throughput of the fibers in a given cart)
